author: RTÉ News
title: Germany begins opening up as virus 'under control'
description: Germany is taking its first steps back towards normality, with smaller shops in some regions opening up for the first time in a month after politicians declared the coronavirus "under control".
content:
Germany is taking its first steps back towards normality, with smaller shops in some regions opening up for the first time in a month after politicians declared the coronavirus "under control".
